title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin points out the biggest issue the Packers face after losing their 3rd game in a row and what this says about star quarterback Aaron Rodgers. He defends the 49ers following their loss to the Chiefs and why they can still be an elite team in the NFC. He tells you why he was right about the Lions and wrong about Tom Brady. Plus, Super Bowl Champion Trent Dilfer joins the show to explain what's wrong with Brady and the Buccaneers and what makes Joe Burrow special. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
